about_the_game:
House parties aren't supposed to result in your death, right?
Find yourself thrown into the depths of darkness with little chance of making it out alive in The Unseen. What starts as a seemingly normal house party quickly turns into a nightmare as you become trapped in a dark, twisting labyrinth beneath. But beware, you are not alone. To survive, you must understand your hunter...

Being Hunted

As apex predators, humans rarely rely on their senses in everyday life. That is about to change. You will need to sharpen your instincts and use the environment to your advantage to evade terrifying threats and unfavourable outcomes. Every shadow, sound, and hiding spot could mean the difference between life and death.

Resource Management

Scarcity breeds chaos. Can you truly trust another human to help you survive, or would you betray them to ensure your own survival? Resources are limited, and every decision matters. Banding together can help you cover more ground and increase your chances of survival, but always keep an eye on your 'friends'. That torch in their hand looks like it's in good condition... but would it look better in your hands?

Crafting

Crafting can ensure your survival, it could also attract some unwanted attention. One wrong move and all your hard work will count for nothing.

Survival

To survive like an animal, you must think like an animal. Cover your scent. Find food. Find water. Adapt to your environment. Use every resource at your disposal. As always, bring something heavy... just in case.

Secrets

Who would do something like this? Why would they do this? What is this place? Find the the answers in the deepest depths of this terrible place. Uncover the dark secrets that force you to fight for survival.
